name: sdkendpoint
label: SDK Service Endpoint
description: The URL of the WebSDK server

name: tokenendpoint
label: Connect authentication endpoint
description: The URL of the Connect portal authenitcation service

name: overwritewarning
label: Warn when output folder exists
description: If output webapp folder exists, ask permission to overwrite it

name: askreload
label: Behaviour when opening WAB dialog
description: Defines the action to perform when WAB is opened

name: compileinserver
label: Use SDK Service to compile app
description: True if the generated JSX file should be compiled using the remote SDK service.
